no.patternsolutions.javann.fam
Class PossibleAssociatedPair

java.lang.Object
  no.patternsolutions.javann.fam.PossibleAssociatedPair

public class PossibleAssociatedPair
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a helper class for the main FAM network class. It is used to store the data belonging to each possible associated pair. The FAM class accesses several of the class variables of this class directly. This is a legacy from the conversion from C++, and was left as it is for now, both to avoid potensial errors when changing things that work prfectly well as they are, and also because changing these to use method call would take extra time and work. All the constructors and methods herein are for use by the main FAM class, and it makes litte sense to call these from outside this class, other than for debug purposes.
